title: MTD - MTD Event Log

The MTD error/event logs can be found in the Tenant Database in the table [mtd].[EventLogs]

title: MTD - No Data For Selected Dates
text: No Data For Selected Dates 20 July 2022 14:38 There seems to be an issue in MTD where submission dates appear to attempt to submit for 1 year in the future. In the below example a user has tried to complete a submission for 1st April 2022 – 30th June 2022: The dates were correct when creating the submission however when they went to fetch the data for this submission period the dates were set a year in advance: This was remedied by attempting the submission in a different browser. You could also try clearing the cache or attempting the submission in incognito/private mode. N.B. clearing the cache should be done at the users discretion as this can clear useful information such as memorised logins, history, cookie preferences etc.
description:
No Data For Selected Dates

20 July 2022

14:38

 

There seems to be an issue in MTD where submission dates appear to attempt to submit for 1 year in the future.

 

In the below example a user has tried to complete a submission for 1st April 2022 – 30th June 2022:

 

 

The dates were correct when creating the submission however when they went to fetch the data for this submission period the dates were set a year in advance:

 

This was remedied by attempting the submission in a different browser. You could also try clearing the cache or attempting the submission in incognito/private mode.

 

N.B. clearing the cache should be done at the users discretion as this can clear useful information such as memorised logins, history, cookie preferences etc.
